entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Charlottetown
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:09 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -26.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Charlottetown Airport 06:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -26.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 100.2 kPa rising
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 53 %
Wind Chill: -43
Dewpoint: -33.6°C
Wind: W 37 km/h gust 58 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High minus 16. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 except gusting to 80 along parts of the coast. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 43 this morning and minus 28 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near minus 16. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing late this evening. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 near midnight. Temperature steady near minus 16. Wind chill near minus 29. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A few flurries. High minus 3.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy in the afternoon with a few flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 25 in the morning and minus 8 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
